price: Tí ẹ bá ṣàfi hàn rere tàbí ẹ fi pamọ́ tàbí ẹ ṣàmójú kúrò níbi aburú, dájúdájú Allāhu ń jẹ́ Alámòjúúkúrò, Alágbára.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ خَيۡرًا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ أَوۡ تَعۡفُواْ عَن سُوٓءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوّٗا قَدِيرًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū khayran aw tukh'fūhu aw taʿfū ʿan sūin fa-inna al-laha kāna ʿafuwwan qadīran
